channel.title: CVE Feed for Motorola -- MH702x
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Motorola -- MH702x

item.title: CVE-2021-3460|2024-08-03T16:53:17.619Z -- motorola -- mh702x
item.description: The Motorola MH702x devices, prior to version 2.0.0.301, do not properly verify the server certificate during communication with the support server which could lead to the communication channel being accessible by an attacker.
